about_the_game:
KOUR 64 is a short 1st-Person Parkour Platformer, inspired by Collectathon games from the late 90's & 2000's, and Other 3D movement games & mods on PC. Graphically it ended up not being very N64-like, but it still captures that vibe & era of gaming. Fun, simple and quick gameplay, with no handholding or time wasting!

EXPLORE!

You awake in a dream! Navigate the various dream worlds using parkour, abilities, and environmental assistance... You must collect enough resources to wake up! Explore the mysterious locations, collect loot and talk to strange inhabitants to make your way through this world.

MOVE!

-Dream Parkour! No stamina, no fall damage, & no lengthy animations! Highly UNREALISTIC!

-Wallrun, Wallclimb, Walljump, Mantle, Vault, Slide and Coil!

-You can infinitely combo moves! Go straight from a wallrun into a wallclimb, and back, ∞!

-Master the movement! The movement mechanics are built for speedrunning and mastery!

WACKY DREAM WORLDS TO EXPLORE!

-Talk to the silly characters

-Explore a variety of locations in the order of your choosing. Each with different objectives.

-See the sights, hear the sounds.

-Play Mini-games, and different modes to switch things up

-An Endless Mode to test your skills, with 5 different levels!

-Discover secrets and lore

THINGS TO COLLECT!

-106 Total Stars!

-Hidden marbles?!?!

-Bonus Movement Abilities!

-Wisdom

About the Development

KOUR 64 was solo developed over the course of 6 months by EZHNO. He is really into collectathons from 1990-2010 and 1st person parkour games. He knew of no game that directly combined the two, so he did the deed himself.

name: KOUR 64

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 4GB or RX550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimates, Not Tested.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: *Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: *i5-9600K (20-30% CPU Usage)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: *GTX 1050 4GB (50-70% GPU Usage)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *These are the developer's specs. Testing done at 150fps on all medium settings.

short_description: KOUR 64 is a goofy 1st-Person Parkour platformer, inspired by Collectathon games from the late 90's. Explore a wacky dream world using a dreamlike depiction of parkour, meet funny characters and grab a bunch of loot in this short adventure.
